name: Superior Leprechaun Magical Air Armour <black>
data: It increases the users strength ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users dexterity ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users constitution ILLEGALLY.
It has superb armour class for its type (ILLEGAL in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users physical resistance unearthly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
